subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: The Frenchman Gaël Monfils defeated Federer in straight sets in the Davis Cup final, but Federer’s teammate Stan Wawrinka helped the Swiss to a 1-1 tie with a victory over Jo-Wilfried Tsonga.
snippet: The Frenchman Gaël Monfils defeated Federer in straight sets in the Davis Cup final, but Federer’s teammate Stan Wawrinka helped the Swiss to a 1-1 tie with a victory over Jo-Wilfried Tsonga.
